title: ESS, Inc.
description: Pioneering safe and sustainable long-duration energy storage, the first commercial iron flow battery technology transforms global energy systems with up to 12 hours of storage life, zero capacity degradation, and versatile applications including renewable baseload energy.

children.value: Pioneering safe and sustainable long-duration energy storage, the first commercial iron flow battery technology transforms global energy systems with up to 12 hours of storage life, zero capacity degradation, and versatile applications including renewable baseload energy.
